runs.comm: length ball, angled across the right-hander and straightening a touch, missed by Uthappa
back of a length, rearing up at the batsman, who drops his hands
on the stumps, swinging back a touch, clipped to square leg
wild bumper down the leg side from Tsotsobe
slightly back of a length, Gambhir tries to turn it to leg but gets a leading edge back down the pitch
full, yorker length, down the leg side, clips the pad and runs almost all the way to the rope - Tsotsobe appeals but it had drifted too far down leg
back of a length and pulled forcefully between midwicket and mid-on
length ball, seaming away and beating Gambhir's outside edge
too wide, touch short, Gambhir seizes on it and punches a savage cut through point, beating the diving fielder
drops short and Gambhir throws various kitchen appliances at the ball, it's a thick top edge, really, but it soars down to third man and just clears the rope
short delivery again, forearm smashed through cover - brutal from the batsman
tighter line and this one is just nudged short on the on side
on the stumps, clipped with a swivel of the hips to deep square leg
length ball, angled across, dabbed short of point and Justin Ontong misses with a diving underarm throw aiming at one stump
held back, outside off and swinging a tad, Gambhir plays a false stroke and chips the ball short of mid-off
fizzing bouncer that Gambhir can't get any bat on as he tries to hook
length ball, on the stumps, worked to midwicket
pitched up, Uthappa steps away and slaps a cut shot into his own pads via an inside edge
tight line, tickled down to long leg
pitched up and dispatched back down the ground by a serenely well-balanced Gambhir
takes the pace off it, Gambhir misconnects with a drive that runs towards cover
back of a length ... and hooked dismissively to backward square. The crowd goes barmy again
pitched up, steps away and drives with a flourish through the covers, some enthusiastic fielding reeling the ball in just before the rope
full length, driven hard on the front foot, well stopped by Botha at mid-off to keep the damage to one
length, on the pads, flicked to midwicket
back of a length, dropped into the off side but the throw to the non-striker's end gifts India overthrows
short ball, blasted back down the ground, though not off the middle - it loops over mid-on for a couple
sliced off a length ball over the slips and down to third man on the bounce
short ball, directed at the batsman's ribs, deflected to short fine leg and Theron misses with a dash at the stumps that would probably have left Uthappa short
fiery bouncer, beats Uthappa's lusty swing outside off
length ball, nudged short of point
length, bit of swing, bits the stroke outside off
length, dabbed towards the slips, they steal one ... and even though Vilas hits the stumps with his throw Uthappa was home
tight line, left-arm over to Uthappa, blocked towards midwicket
pitched up, scooped to cover on the bounce
full toss, outside off stump, walks across and chops to deep backward square - maybe missed out on cashing in there?
check drive down the ground, well stopped at mid-off
tossed up, on the stumps, driven on the full through extra-cover for Uthappa's first boundary
flighted, leg-stump line, goes for the big heave but doesn't connect properly
full toss, clipped through midwicket
length ball, outside off, not much room but Gambhir plays it late, cutting deftly behind point - lovely stroke
tossed up outside off, driven to cover, no run
flatter ball, slightly wider, flipped towards point for a single
pitched up, just outside off, driven hard, the arms swinging through the stroke ... but straight to cover
back of a length but it doesn't get up that much, Gambhir plays across the line and his top edge loops high, fine and down to long leg
width for Gambhir, who slashes a length ball to the square boundary on the off side for a more authentic four
dribbled out towards point for one
length ball, punched down the ground to long-off
